navigation.connectOrganizations: Connect with organizations and discover new opportunities to make a difference.

hero.title: Connect. Volunteer. Impact.
hero.subtitle: Join a community of passionate volunteers and organizations making a real difference in your local area.

features.title: Why Choose Voluna?
features.subtitle: We make volunteering simple, meaningful, and rewarding for everyone involved.

trackImpact.title: Track Impact
trackImpact.description: Monitor your volunteer hours and see the real impact you're making in your community with detailed analytics and progress tracking.

connectLocal.title: Connect with local Organizations
connectLocal.description: Connect directly with verified local organizations and build meaningful relationships that create lasting positive change.

findOpportunities.title: Find Opportunities
findOpportunities.description: Discover opportunities that match your skills, interests, and schedule with our intelligent matching system.

seniorProjects.title: Senior Projects
seniorProjects.description: Share your senior project with the community and connect with other students working on similar initiatives.

testimonials.title: What Our Community Says
testimonials.subtitle: Real stories from volunteers and organizations making a difference together.

footer.tagline: Connecting volunteers with organizations to create meaningful impact in communities worldwide.

rollCall.title: Roll Call
rollCall.onlyOwnerCanAccess: Only the organization owner can access roll call for this opportunity.
rollCall.attendanceInstructions: Click on each volunteer to toggle their attendance status. Hours will be automatically awarded to attendees.
rollCall.noVolunteers: No volunteers signed up for this opportunity.
rollCall.footerNote: Roll call can be updated anytime during or after the event. Changes to attendance will automatically update volunteer hours.

onboarding.cardClickTitle: Click Any Card to View Details
onboarding.cardClickDescription: You can click anywhere on a senior project card to see more details and sign up to participate.
onboarding.createProjectDescription: If you're a senior and have a project to share, this button allows you to do so.
onboarding.signupDescription: Create an account to join senior projects and track your volunteer hours.
